newsitem.title: KENYA: Kenya forecasts GDP growth down to four pct.
newsitem.headline: Kenya forecasts GDP growth down to four pct.

text.p: Kenyan Finance Minister Musalia Mudavadi on Thursday forecast a decline in economic growth this year on account of drought in East Africa in early 1997.

Mudavadi forecast gross domestic product (GDP) growth at 4.0 percent in 1997 from 4.6 percent in 1996 and 4.8 percent in 1995. He said the drought had led to a dramatic rise in food prices, forcing a rise in inflation to 12.3 percent in the first quarter of 1997 from 5.1 percent in 1995/96.
